fullplot: A genetically mutated dog is accidentally released from the lab of Dr. Jarret and ends up at the home of news reporter/animal rights advocate Lori Tanner. The dog, Max, endowed with intelligence and other special abilities, is at first lovable, but also proves to be a ferocious, unstoppable killer.
plot: A dog turns from man's best friend into man's worst nightmare as he attacks everything that moves.
title: Man's Best Friend
